game.name: Tower Defense Alien War
game.description:
We have got you covered today with a brand new adventure game that is designed with the concept of defense. Alien troops have invaded your castle and you are the only one who is left with some weapons. Now your job is to protect your castle against a horde of blood-thirsty aliens. Do you think that you are capable enough to handle this situation on your own? Join Tower Defense Alien War and get ready to destroy the powerful invaders by applying a strong fighting strategy!
Grab your gun, enter the battlefield and be prepared to fight like never before in the intense action-packed challenge!

Complete missions and grab gold to upgrade your weapons and characters! Try to collect as much gold as you can to equip yourself with advanced weapons! You have to use your all energy and power to survive in the complex levels of this html5 war game. Destroy all the things you spot on your way and guide yourself towards the most awaited victory with your right decisions!

The entire earth has a good faith on you so try to do your best to combat against the invasion of these creepy creatures. There are multiple levels, diverse weapons and different flexible defensive tactics to explore. Bring the reasonable tactics to use to prevent these unexpected attack campaigns of the alien creatures! The beautiful graphics, soothing music and simple controls will keep you glued to the screen for long. Check out more popular tower strategy games for boys and girls that are playable on devices like desktops, mobile phones and tables, no download required!
